seo.defaultTitle: Cotiza Studio - Digital Manufacturing Quoting Platform
seo.defaultDescription: Get instant quotes for 3D printing, CNC machining, and laser cutting. Compare prices, optimize designs, and save up to 60% on production costs.

home.title: Instant Quotes for Digital Manufacturing
home.description: Cotiza Studio provides instant pricing for 3D printing, CNC machining, and laser cutting. Upload your file and get your quote in seconds.

quote.title: Create New Quote
quote.description: Upload your CAD files and get instant quotes with DFM analysis, process comparison, and cost optimization.

try.title: Try Our Quoting Tools
try.description: Explore our interactive tools: DIY vs professional calculator, link-based quoting, and persona selection.

login.title: Sign In
login.description: Access your Cotiza Studio account to manage quotes, orders, and settings.

register.title: Create Free Account
register.description: Sign up for Cotiza Studio and start saving on your digital manufacturing projects.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your quotes, orders, and manufacturing projects from one place.
